thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Angela
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Angela

author: Angela
title: Angela
text: We had a wonderful experience working with the crew at Pelican. They were easy to talk to, answered questions and made the process very seamless. We are loving our water. There is a notable difference. Our hands are softer and it tastes perfect! We will come to Pelican for further needs down the road. thanks!
